data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mroz, Ewa, Depa, Lukasz, Artchawakom, Taksin, Gorczyca, Jacek (2014): Micromyzusplatycerii sp. n. (Hemiptera, Aphididae) - a new fern-feeding aphid species from Thailand. ZooKeys 456: 49-57, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.456.8598, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.456.8598
